duties_responsibilities.duty: Assisting the firm's research & investment team in administrative and support functions including scheduling travel, managing the team's calendar, and gathering public financial data.
Contacting clients to schedule meetings and providing administrative and research support including travel booking and public financial data research & reporting.
Managing in-office calendar to provide and schedule meetings and providing room availability.
Contacting existing and potential clients to schedule internal and external business meetings.

education_certification.credential: At least two years of experience in supporting a research/investment team within financial services
